links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1).
formula: a(n) = 8 + 4*(-1)^n - 6*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 09 2009

prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 35000); x=contfrac(sqrt(39)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040032.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 05 2009
